public class north

Class to handle a player wishing to move north

north()

call(Controller, Player, StringTokenizer)
If movement is possible, the player is moved.

call 
 public void call(Controller con,
                  Player p,
                  StringTokenizer str)
If movement is possible, the player is moved. Anyone that can see the player leaving/arriving is informed of the fact.
